meanings.meaning: that you can get, buy, use, etc.

examples: The product will now be made available throughout the market.
Grants should be available for all students.
Details are available from the above address.
This information is freely available to anyone wishing to see it.

meanings.meaning: free to be seen, talked to, etc.

examples: She is in a meeting at present, but I will let you know as soon as she becomes available.
The chairman was not available for comment.
